COM.sootNsmoke.jvm
Class ConstantRef

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--COM.sootNsmoke.jvm.GenericConstant
        |
        +--COM.sootNsmoke.jvm.ConstantRef
Direct Known Subclasses:
ConstantFieldref, ConstantInterfaceMethodref, ConstantMethodref
public abstract class ConstantRef
extends GenericConstant

Fieldref's, Methodref's, and InterfaceMethodref's all contain exactly the same data. This class serves as a base to all three.

See Also:
COM.sootNsmoke.Fieldref, COM.sootNsmoke.Methodref, COM.sootNsmoke.InterfaceMethodref
